content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (18.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (21.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (24.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (27.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces at:
  - (16.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (19.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (22.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (25.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (28.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Repeated placement errors (occurred 8 times)
- Cannot place wooden-chest at (15.5, 72.5) - position already occupied
- Verify position is empty before placing new entities
- Use get_entities_at() to check for existing objects before placement attempts

### Belt connection failures (occurred 3 times)
- Failed to connect transport belts from mining drills to target positions
- Verify valid path exists between source and destination before belt placement
- Ensure proper spacing between entities for belt connections
- Consider using underground belts for crossing existing structures

### Mining drill output issues
- All mining drills show "output blocked" warnings
- Need proper output connections via belts/inserters to furnaces or chests
- Current inserter at (15.5, 72.5) not properly connected to mining drill output

### Furnace operation problems
- 3 furnaces are out of fuel at positions (22.0, 65.0), (25.0, 65.0), (28.0, 65.0)
- All furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warnings
- Need to establish proper material flow from mining drills to furnaces

### Inserter configuration issues
- All burner inserters are waiting for source items
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions align with entity input/output slots
- Ensure inserters have sufficient fuel (coal) to operate
- Check inserter directions are properly set for material flow
